message: Any suggestions for project management integrations with github?
I use redmine.
I've been using unfuddle for bug tracking and feature requests, but I haven't found an easy integration between unfuddle & github.  maybe switch to pivotal tracker?
i think pivotal added github integration recently
i've never used pivotal, does it work well for bug tracking as well?
I'm looking for something that will let our non-tech people interface more directly with engineers
with support to link code commits to bug and feature requests
Works quite well.
I used to host the repos on GitHub, now i host them on the redmine+gitosis setup and github
Does pivotal have github integration?
Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible support git, and those integrate with Jira and their other tools.
@kennethreitz yes they have
